name: acsficld
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(cima(c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)))))

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(cima(c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)))), wcel(c2, cfv(cacs, c3)), wss(c1, c3))
stmt.pretty: syl2anc(w0, (c0 ` c1)= ⋃(c0 "(P(c1)⋂ Fin)), c2 ∈(ACS ` c3), c1 ⊆ c3)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(cima(c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cacs, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c1, c3))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c2, cfv(cacs, c3)), wss(c1, c3)), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(cima(c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(cima(c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cacs, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c1, c3))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c2, cfv(cacs, c3)), wss(c1, c3)), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(cima(c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c2, cfv(cacs, c3)), wss(c1, c3)), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(cima(c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)))))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cmrc, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(cima(c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cacs, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c1, c3))

comment: In an algebraic closure system, the closure of a set is the union of the closures of its finite subsets. Deduction form of ~ acsficl . (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
